name: Brick Breaker: Journeys
description:
Introducing Brick Breaker: Journeys, an energetic and action-packed brick crusher puzzle game with a spin! Embark on an exciting adventure in this free and fun brick breaking game that takes you through fast-paced and nostalgic journeys filled with endless challenging stages! It’s time to put your strategy skills to the test.

Dive into a reimagined classic puzzle game with a unique twist: no paddles, just an array of balls for you to aim and fire at complex brick patterns. Blast your way through each level and experience the thrill of clearing all the bricks to advance to the next stage. Put your skills, logic, and puzzle brain power to work to clear the boards, but don’t worry, you’ll be able to unlock plenty of power-ups to help you blast through all the bricks.

Key Features:
- Brick Breaker: Journeys is FREE to play!
- Journeys: Explore 10-stage sets with unique mechanics, endless brick patterns and boards, thanks to our innovative stage generator.
- Extended Aiming Guide Line: Enjoy this free feature that helps you predictively aim three 'bounces' ahead, making your brick breaking experience even more engaging.
- Generated Stages: Tackle over 3,000 fun stages across 300 Journeys, all created by our state-of-the-art stage generator.
- Power-Ups: Unlock unique power-ups like lightning and bombs to destroy indestructible bricks.
- Diamond Collection: Collect diamonds hidden within bricks and exchange them for Ball Skins in the in-game shop.
- Ball Shop: Unlock unique ball skins and customize the look of your shooting ball.
- XP: Level up your game by collecting XP at the completion of each stage.
- No Wi-Fi needed! Play anytime, anywhere, offline or on airplane mode.


Experience the puzzle game that feels like a fun blast from the past! The gameplay feels like the classic ‘Breakout’ game but with a futuristic look and feel. Explore the endless possibilities of generated stages, and don't forget to collect diamonds to personalize your game with Ball Skins. Brick Breaker: Journeys is a high octane puzzle game in which you’ll have to use logic, problem solving skills, and expert precision to clear the boards. Let’s see if you have what it takes to blast through all the bricks in one shot!

Ready to embark on this fun brick crushing adventure? Download Brick Breaker: Journeys now and become the ultimate brick breaker champion!
